title: Professional Customer Service Representative
snippet:
We are seeking an energetic, professional, Customer Service Representative to join their team. If you're customer-focused and interested in working with a well-respected leading screen technology company, apply today! 

Responsibilities: 
• Act as a liaison between customers and companies
• Manage orders and accounts
• Respond promptly to customer inquiries and complaints
• Collect and analyze customer information for reports
• Process payments
• Other duties as assigned

Qualifications/Background profile: 
• High school diploma or equivalent 
• Minimum one year of customer service and/or call center experience
• Ability to provide a high level of customer service
• Excellent communication skills 
• Must be able to multitask in a fast-paced environment
